birth_place.zh-cn: 大清安徽省庐州府巢县烔炀镇中李村
birth_place.en: Zhongli Village, Tongyang Town, Chao County, Luzhou Prefecture, Anhui Province, Qing Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军副总参谋长、中共中央调查部部长等职。长期负责情报工作，被称为中共的“特务之王”。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the PLA and Minister of the Central Investigation Department of the CCP. He was in charge of intelligence work for a long time and was known as the 'King of Spies' of the CCP.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军事指挥机关。
description.en: The military command headquarters of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, former Chief of the General Staff of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, former Chief of the General Staff of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, former Chief of the General Staff of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的情报机构。
description.en: The intelligence agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央调查部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former Minister of the Central Investigation Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李克农的夫人。
description.en: Spouse of Li Kenong.

description.zh-cn: 李克农之子，曾任中国人民解放军总后勤部副部长，中将军衔。
description.en: Son of Li Kenong, former Deputy Director of the PLA General Logistics Department, with the rank of Lieutenant General.

description.zh-cn: 位于芜湖的一所学校，李克农曾在此就读。
description.en: A school in Wuhu where Li Kenong studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于芜湖的一所教会学校，李克农曾在此就读。
description.en: A mission school in Wuhu where Li Kenong studied.

description.zh-cn: 对中共三位著名情报人员钱壮飞、李克农、胡底的合称。
description.en: A collective name for three famous CCP intelligence agents: Qian Zhuangfei, Li Kenong, and Hu Di.

nodes.id: 中国工农红军第一方面军

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第一方面军

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会曾经的情报和反情报机构。
description.en: A former intelligence and counter-intelligence agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责外交事务的政府部门。
description.en: The government department of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期情报人员，“龙潭三杰”之一。
description.en: An early CCP intelligence agent, one of the 'Longtan Three Heroes'.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期情报人员，“龙潭三杰”之一。
description.en: An early CCP intelligence agent, one of the 'Longtan Three Heroes'.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人之一，后被捕叛变。
description.en: An early leader of the CCP who was later arrested and defected.

description.zh-cn: 国民党特务机关中统的负责人之一。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Central Bureau of Investigation and Statistics (Zhongtong), a Kuomintang intelligence agency.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1935年间设立的情报和政治保卫机关。
description.en: The intelligence and political security agency established by the Communist Party of China between 1927 and 1935.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，东北军领导人，西安事变发动者之一。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China, leader of the Northeastern Army, and one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将。
description.en: A General First Class of the Republic of China Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，后脱离中共。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who later left the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的情报机构，后并入中共中央社会部。
description.en: The intelligence agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, later merged into the Central Social Affairs Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China and a Marshal of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾负责情报及安全工作。
description.en: A former major leader of the CCP and the PRC, once in charge of intelligence and security work.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、翻译家，在延安整风运动中被处决。
description.en: A Chinese writer and translator who was executed during the Yan'an Rectification Movement.

description.zh-cn: 负责中国共产党和国家保密工作的机构。
description.en: The agency responsible for the confidentiality work of the CCP and the state.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: The main founder and the first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会总情报部

zh-cn: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会总情报部

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

position.en: Deputy Chief of the General Staff

description.zh-cn: 李克农担任副总参谋长期间，粟裕为时任总参谋长。
description.en: When Li Kenong served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Su Yu was the Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 李克农担任副总参谋长期间，黄克诚为时任总参谋长。
description.en: When Li Kenong served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Huang Kecheng was the Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 李克农担任副总参谋长期间，罗瑞卿为时任总参谋长。
description.en: When Li Kenong served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Luo Ruiqing was the Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 孔原接替李克农出任中共中央调查部部长。
description.en: Kong Yuan succeeded Li Kenong as Minister of the Central Investigation Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共情报人员参与第一次国共内战。
description.en: Participated in the First Chinese Civil War as a CCP intelligence agent.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间从事统战和情报工作。
description.en: Engaged in united front and intelligence work during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间负责情报工作。
description.en: Was in charge of intelligence work during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 作为朝鲜停战谈判中方代表团的总指挥和最高负责人，参与停战谈判。
description.en: Participated in the armistice negotiations as the commander-in-chief and highest responsible person of the Chinese delegation for the Korean War Armistice Negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 同为“龙潭三杰”成员，在中共中央特科共事。
description.en: Both were members of the 'Longtan Three Heroes' and worked together in the CCP Central Special Branch.

description.zh-cn: 同为“龙潭三杰”成员，在中共中央特科共事。
description.en: Both were members of the 'Longtan Three Heroes' and worked together in the CCP Central Special Branch.

description.zh-cn: 在顾顺章叛变后，李克农及时向中共中央传递情报，避免了重大损失。
description.en: After Gu Shunzhang's defection, Li Kenong promptly passed on intelligence to the CCP Central Committee, preventing major losses.

description.zh-cn: 获取顾顺章叛变的情报后，派人通知李克农。
description.en: After obtaining intelligence about Gu Shunzhang's defection, sent someone to inform Li Kenong.

description.zh-cn: 及时转报顾顺章叛变的情报，使中共中央机关得以安全转移。
description.en: Promptly relayed the intelligence of Gu Shunzhang's defection, allowing the CCP Central Committee organs to safely relocate.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央特科领导下从事秘密情报工作。
description.en: Engaged in secret intelligence work under the leadership of the CCP Central Special Branch.

description.zh-cn: 在潜伏于上海无线电管理局期间，任徐恩曾下属。
description.en: Served under Xu Enzeng while undercover at the Shanghai Radio Administration Bureau.

relationships.target: 中国工农红军第一方面军

position.en: Director of the Political Security Bureau

description.zh-cn: 参加长征，负责敌情侦察和保卫中共中央机关安全。
description.en: Participated in the Long March, responsible for enemy reconnaissance and the security of the CCP Central Committee organs.

description.zh-cn: 在洛川与张学良谈判并达成局部停战协定。
description.en: Negotiated with Zhang Xueliang in Luochuan and reached a local armistice agreement.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共代表团秘书长，协助周恩来处理西安事变，促进国共谈判。
description.en: As secretary-general of the CCP delegation, assisted Zhou Enlai in handling the Xi'an Incident and promoting KMT-CCP negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 在西安事变及日内瓦会议等多个场合，作为周恩来的助手开展工作。
description.en: Worked as Zhou Enlai's assistant on multiple occasions, including the Xi'an Incident and the Geneva Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在潼关与顾祝同进行停止内战的谈判。
description.en: Negotiated with Gu Zhutong in Tongguan to cease the civil war.

description.zh-cn: 在张国焘叛逃中共时将其扣留。
description.en: Detained Zhang Guotao when he defected from the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央后方委员会期间，于叶剑英领导下开展情报工作。
description.en: During his time at the CCP Central Rear Committee, he conducted intelligence work under the leadership of Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 与康生共同下令将王实味秘密处死。
description.en: Jointly with Kang Sheng, ordered the secret execution of Wang Shiwei.

description.zh-cn: 与李克农共同下令将王实味秘密处死。
description.en: Jointly with Li Kenong, ordered the secret execution of Wang Shiwei.

description.zh-cn: 与康生共同下令将王实味秘密处死。
description.en: Jointly with Kang Sheng, ordered the secret execution of Wang Shiwei.

description.zh-cn: 李克农接替康生出任中共中央社会部（前身为情报部）部长。
description.en: Li Kenong succeeded Kang Sheng as Minister of the Central Social Affairs Department (formerly the Intelligence Department).

description.zh-cn: 领导破获了国民党特工密谋刺杀毛泽东的案件，保护了其安全。
description.en: Led the effort to foil a Kuomintang assassination plot against Mao Zedong, ensuring his safety.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会总情报部

description.zh-cn: 出席日内瓦会议，协助周恩来工作，并主持代表团的内外事务和联络工作。
description.en: Attended the Geneva Conference, assisted Zhou Enlai, and presided over the internal and external affairs and liaison work of the delegation.

description.zh-cn: 在李克农诞辰九十周年时，作为中华人民共和国主席高度评价李克农。
description.en: As President of the People's Republic of China, highly praised Li Kenong on the 90th anniversary of his birth.
